DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of DF277 for the treatment of otic eczema.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of DF277 Compared to Placebo in the Treatment of Otic Eczema
DOC.criteria: 12 years or older Clinical diagnosis of otic eczema suitable for local treatment Other diseases.
